product_name: AlpineAire Creamy Potato Cheddar Soup - 2 Servings
long_description: Warm up on a chilly evening at the campsite with the AlpineAire Creamy Potato Cheddar soup freeze-dried dinner. Easy to prepare in its own foil pouch; just add boiling water and stir, let stand for 10 - 12 mins. and then serve. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Warm up on a chilly evening at the campsite with the AlpineAire Creamy Potato Cheddar soup freeze-dried dinner.
